name: NIGHTSTAR: Rogue Wings
description:
NIGHTSTAR™: Rogue Wings is an ARCADE FLIGHT COMBAT GAME about rapid air battles and fast-paced missions. From third-person view or from an immersive cockpit view you will fight your way to rise up against an evil Artificial Intelligence that rules the galaxy! It takes you on a breathtaking journey with beautifully handcrafted environments, battleships, and enemy fighters. Playing as Commander Eastwood on a single player campaign mode, your skills as a pilot will be put to the test while you learn secrets about your sworn enemy, the Absolute Unity through completing missions on all the 5 COMPLETE LEVELS available in this Early Access version. Triple-A art and effects, and state-of-the-art sound design await.

Features
  • FIGHT. Rapid air battles and up-close dogfighting bring your skills as a pilot to the limit.
  • GET IMMERSED. This arcade flight combat game combines a unique target lock system and intense warfare.
  • UPGRADE. Collect resources and turn your ship into an unstoppable war machine.
  • ENJOY. Revel in handcrafted scenarios with no procedurally generated content.
  • GO FULL THROTTLE. Your two wingmen will be on your side to teach the enemy a lesson they won’t forget.
  • BE A NIGHTSTAR: ROGUE WING. Scroll down to check out what awaits.

What's available on Early Access:
  • Single player campaign mode with 5 COMPLETE LEVELS
  • Tactical third person view AND immersive cockpit view
  • Unique flying mechanics
  • Triple-A art and effects
  • State-of-the-art sound design



Planned Upcoming Features
  • 7 complete levels with unique enemies and bosses
  • Full PlayStation®4 and Xbox One gamepad support
  • Even more weapons
  • Neat customization options
  • Dynamic open world missions
  • Steam Trading Cards and Achievements
